resources.string: Click notification to return to app
GoogleApiClient no yet connected. Try again.
Geofence service is not available now
Your app has registered too many geofences
You have provided too many PendingIntents to the addGeofences() call
Unknown error: the Geofence service is not available now
Geofence transition error: invalid transition type %1$d
Location services must be enabled to laud/hoot. Enable location services?
Location services must be enabled for laudhoot.

FAQs could not be found. This can happen when network services are disabled or were just turned on. If they were just turned on it may take a moment. Give it a few seconds and then refresh the feed by pulling down on this message.

Shouts could not be found. This can happen when location services are disabled or were just turned on. If they were just turned on it may take a moment to get the location. Give it a few seconds and then refresh the feed by pulling down on this message.

Replies could not be found. This can happen when location services are disabled or were just turned on. If they were just turned on it may take a moment to get the location. Give it a few seconds and then refresh the feed by pulling down on this message.
Data services must be enabled to laud/hoot. Enable data services?
Data services must be enabled for laudhoot.
There is a network error, you can try again later.
Laudhoot server ins\'t responding, please try again later.
Data conversion error, please send error report.
Unexpected error, please send error report.
Unexpected web service error, please try again later.
Not able to get security tokens, you may try again.
Not able to complete automated registration, exiting.
Cannot load more shouts at this moment
Cannot load more faqs at this moment
Cannot load more replies at this moment
You do not have any new notifications.
